EmailTemplate.description: Don’t Miss Out! A Free eBook to Help FIs Keep Up With Cash Use
EmailTemplate.name: 10-21-21 BNK SelfServ 24 Email 4.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Oops – let’s try that again. Download the eBook!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The rise of digital payment preferences is real, but cash is still an important payment choice. You only need to look at the high cash-in-circulation levels over the last year to see that cash remains the go-to during a crisis. And the control, privacy, ease and immediacy of cash payments means it will always be a preferred choice. But cash use is changing—impacting FIs. Read our eBook to explore how cash use is evolving around the world, and what you should be doing to prepare for it. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
